title: We are hiring a talented Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to manage digital advertising campaigns remotely.
job_overview:
We are hiring a talented Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to manage digital advertising campaigns remotely.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary range: $3000 - $5000/month depending on skillset

What you will do:

Plan, execute, and optimize paid campaigns on Google and Facebook.

Monitor ad performance and report on results.

Provide recommendations for improvement based on data insights.

Requirements:

Over 1 year of experience managing paid ad campaigns.

Solid knowledge of ad KPIs and audience targeting strategies.

Comfortable working remotely.
